sen.j: 近江国風土記(おうみのくにふどき)は、近江国の風土記。
sen.e: Omi-no-kuni Fudoki is Fudoki (Description of regional climate, culture, etc.) of the Province of Omi.
Omi-no-kuni Fudoki is a fudoki (Description of regional climate, culture, etc.) of the Omi Province.
Omi-no-kuni Fudoki is a fudoki (Description of regional climate, culture, etc.) of the Omi Province.

sen.j: 逸文であるため、内容は『帝王編年記』などの二次資料によるしかない。
sen.e: As it is a Itsubun (a composition previously existed but does not exist now), the contents have to be referred to the secondary sources such as "Teio Hennen ki (the Chronicle of emperors)".
As it is a Itsubun (a composition previously existed but does not exist now), the contents have to be referred to the secondary sources such as "Teio Hennen ki (the Chronicle of emperors)".
As it is a Itsubun (a composition previously existed but does not exist now), the contents have to be referred to the secondary sources such as "Teio Hennen ki" (the Chronicle of emperors).
sen.cmt: クォーテーション調整

sen.j: 断片的な文の中で特筆すべきなのは、伊香郡余呉湖に伝わる羽衣伝説と竹生島の伝承に言及している箇所である。
sen.e: The contents that should be noted in the fragmentary writings are Robe of Feathers Legend coming down to the Lake Yogo in Ika County, and the part mentioning the tradition of Chikubushima Island.

Among the fragmentary writings, contents that are highly important include descriptions on Robe of Feathers Legend that is handed down by tradition in the Lake Yogo area in Ika County and the tradition of Chikubushima Island.
sen.cmt: 「余呉湖」は湖そのものではなく湖周辺の地域と解釈して表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Among the fragmentary writings, contents that are highly important include descriptions on Robe of Feathers Legend that is handed down by tradition in the Lake Yogo area in Ika County and the tradition of Chikubushima Island.

tit.e: Robe of Feathers Legend came down the Lake Yogo.
Robe of Feathers Legend in the Lake Yogo area
